rules_text:
Whenever a creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Grim Armory.
Whenever a creature you control enters, you may move a +1/+1 counter from Grim Armory onto it.
flavor_text:
[i]“I remember when I lost my mind. There was something so pleasant about that place.”
—Marcello Vitale, AOSE Turncoat[/i]
